login.description: Enter your email and password below to login to your account

alerts.enter2FA: Please enter your Two Factor Authentication code
alerts.enter2FARecoveryKey: Please enter your Two Factor Authentication recovery key

register.description: Enter your email and password below to create an account

alerts.passwordWeak: Your chosen password is too weak

success.title: Account created
success.description: We have sent a confirmation email to {{email}}. Please click the link in the email to confirm you registration. Make sure to also check your spam folder.

reset.description: Enter your email address, your new password and import your master keys to reset your password

noMasterKeysImported.title: Reset password
noMasterKeysImported.description: I understand that by resetting my password without my exported master keys I will render all data stored on my account inaccessible due to how zero-knowledge end-to-end encryption works.

noMasterKeysImported2.title: Reset password
noMasterKeysImported2.description: Are you sure? You are about to delete all data stored on your account if you do not import your master keys. You can simply ignore this warning if you do not have your master keys file and you want to reset your account.

alerts.invalidMasterKeysFileWrongUserId: Those keys belongs to a different account
alerts.passwordWeak: Your chosen password is too weak

selectDriveItem.title: Select
selectDriveItem.empty: No files or directories uploaded yet

publicLink.title: Public link
publicLink.progress: {{done}} of {{total}} items added to the public link
publicLink.subscriptionNeeded: You need an active subscription to create public links.

stopSharing.title: Stop sharing
stopSharing.description: Are you sure you want to stop sharing {{item}} with {{name}}?

success.title: Email address changed
success.description: We have sent a confirmation email to {{email}}. Please click the link in the email to confirm your new email address. Make sure to also check your spam folder.

personalInformation.title: Change personal information
personalInformation.needsCountrySetup: Please select a country so we can calculate the correct VAT.

twoFactorCode.title: Two Factor Authentication
twoFactorCode.info: Please enter your Two Factor Authentication code

delete.title: Delete file version
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} permanently? This action cannot be undone!

report.title: Report abuse
report.commentPlaceholder: Please provide us with all the needed details so that we can take appropriate action as soon as possible (optional)

createSync.name: Sync name
createSync.title: Create sync
createSync.disableLocalTrash: Disable local trash and delete items permanently instead

mode.twoWayInfo: Mirror every action in both directions
mode.localToCloudInfo: Mirror every action done locally to the cloud but never act on cloud changes
mode.localBackupInfo: Only upload data to the cloud, never delete anything or act on cloud changes
mode.cloudToLocalInfo: Mirror every action done in the cloud locally but never act on local changes
mode.cloudBackupInfo: Only download data from the cloud, never delete anything or act on local changes

errors.localPathNotWritable: The local path you have selected is not writable. Please make sure the client can access it properly.
errors.invalidLocalPath: The local path you have selected is invalid and cannot be synced. Please choose a different path.
errors.remotePathAlreadyConfigured: The cloud path you have selected is already configured in a different sync. This can lead to infinite sync loops.
errors.localPathAlreadyConfigured: The local path you have selected is already configured in a different sync. This can lead to infinite sync loops.
errors.syncNameAlreadyExists: A sync with the name "{{name}}" already exists.
errors.localPathSyncedByICloud: You cannot sync a path already synced by iCloud.

localDirectoryBig.title: Warning
localDirectoryBig.description: Syncing more than {{count}} items can slow down your system, especially on lower-end devices. If you're on a high-end machine, you may proceed, but we recommend syncing fewer files to avoid potential issues.

localDirectoryNotPhysical.title: Warning
localDirectoryNotPhysical.description: The local directory you have selected does not seem to be on a physical disk. This can cause sync issues and unpredictable behaviour. Do you want to continue?

desktopUpdate.title: Update available
desktopUpdate.info: A new version ({{version}}) has been downloaded and is ready to be installed. Do you want to update?
desktopUpdate.installing: Installing update, please do not interrupt this process!

storage.title: Not enough storage
storage.info: You do not have enough storage available. In order to upload more files you need to buy a plan. All plans stack in terms of storage. You can subscribe to as many plans as you want.

exportReminder.title: Export master keys
exportReminder.description: Please export your master keys and store them in a separate safe location. You need your master keys when you reset your password to avoid data loss. You need to export your master keys everytime you change your password.

trash.title: Trash
trash.description: Are you sure you want to send {{name}} to the trash? You can always recover it afterwards.

trashMultiple.title: Trash
trashMultiple.description: Are you sure you want to send {{count}} items to the trash? You can always recover it afterwards.

deletePermanently.title: Delete permanently
deletePermanently.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} permanently? This action cannot be undone!

deletePermanentlyMultiple.title: Delete permanently
deletePermanentlyMultiple.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} items permanently? This action cannot be undone!

chats.maxSizeReached: Maximum message size is limited to {{chars}} characters

empty.title: No chats yet
empty.description: Chats that you have created or that you have been added to will appear here

header.title: End-to-end encrypted chat
header.description: Filen secures every chat with zero-knowledge end-to-end encryption by default.
header.feature1: Only the members of the chat can decrypt and read the content
header.feature2: The system ensures that the data received actually comes from the displayed user and has not been changed

deleteMessage.title: Delete message
deleteMessage.description: Are you sure you want to delete this message? This action cannot be undone!

removeParticipant.title: Remove participant
removeParticipant.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from this chat?

deleteConversation.title: Delete chat
deleteConversation.description: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? This action cannot be undone!

leaveConversation.title: Leave chat
leaveConversation.description: Are you sure you want to leave this chat?

unblock.title: Unblock user
unblock.description: Are you sure you want to unblock {{name}}?

remove.title: Remove contact
remove.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from your contacts?

block.title: Block user
block.description: Are you sure you want to block {{name}}?

sendRequest.title: Send contact request
sendRequest.placeholder: Email address of a Filen user

deleteVersions.title: Delete file versions
deleteVersions.description: Are you sure you want to delete all file versions? This action cannot be undone!

deleteAll.title: Delete all files and directories
deleteAll.description: Are you sure you want to delete all files and directories? This action cannot be undone!

deleteAll2.title: Delete all files and directories
deleteAll2.description: Are you really sure? This action cannot be undone!

deleteAll3.title: Delete all files and directories
deleteAll3.description: Are you 100% sure? This action cannot be undone!

requestAccountDeletion.title: Account deletion
requestAccountDeletion.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account and all data associated with it? We will send you a confirmation email. This action cannot be undone!

logout.title: Logout
logout.description: Are you sure you want to logout?

clearThumbnailCache.title: Clear thumbnail cache
clearThumbnailCache.description: Are you sure you want to clear the local thumbnail cache? This will free up local storage space, but image previews will need to be generated again when needed.

cancelSubscription.title: Cancel subscription
cancelSubscription.description: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?

nickName.title: Edit nickname
nickName.invalid: Nickname must be between 3 and 32 characters long and alphanumeric.

twoFactorAuthenticationRecoveryKey.title: Recovery key
twoFactorAuthenticationRecoveryKey.description: Please store your Two Factor Authentication recovery key in a safe location. It is the only way to regain access to your account in case you lose your Two Factor Authentication device!

minimizeToTray.name: Minimize to tray
minimizeToTray.info: Hide Filen in the tray instead of minimizing the window

autoLaunch.name: Autostart
autoLaunch.info: Start Filen automatically on system start

invite.title: Receive up to 30 GB of storage by inviting others
invite.description: For every friend you invite to Filen you receive {{yourEarnings}} - and your friend also receives {{otherEarnings}}. It's that easy.

subscriptions.info: {{storage}} storage with unlimited uploads, downloads, notes and chats. Unlocking Filen's full potential.
subscriptions.cannotCancelTooEarly: Subscriptions can only be cancelled 24 hours after the initial purchase.

plans.legal1: By purchasing a plan you authorize Filen to automatically charge you each billing period until you cancel. You can cancel anytime via your Account page. No partial refunds.
plans.legal2: You also automatically agree to our

twoFactorAuthentication.name: Two Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuthentication.info: Enable or disable Two Factor Authentication

exportMasterKeys.name: Export master keys
exportMasterKeys.info: Export your master keys so that you can restore your account in case you need to reset your password. You need to export your master keys everytime you change your password.
exportMasterKeys.subInfo: Please export your master keys and store them in a separate safe location. You need your master keys when you reset your password to avoid data loss. You need to export your master keys everytime you change your password.

lockTimeout.name: Lock app
lockTimeout.info: Lock the app after a set amount of time when you are inactive. You have to set up a PIN for the lock screen to work

lockPin.name: Lock PIN
lockPin.info: Set up a PIN to unlock the app

lockPin.notMatching: The PINs you've entered do not match

lock.tooManyAttempts: Too many unlock attempts, try again later.

avatar.name: Avatar
avatar.info: Your avatar will be visible publicly
avatar.invalid: Invalid image. Allowed file types are PNG and JPG, 2MB maximum size.

personalInformation.name: Personal information
personalInformation.info: Edit your personal information. Only for business customers. Will be used for invoicing and is not public.

requestAccountData.name: Request account data
requestAccountData.info: Request all personal data we store according to GDPR

requestAccountDeletion.name: Request account deletion
requestAccountDeletion.info: Request deletion of your account. We will send you a confirmation email

share.title: Share
share.placeholder: Email address of a Filen user

linksNoSub.description: Upgrading to a any pro plan will unlock public links for your account

publicLink.title: Empty directory
publicLink.info: The owner of this directory has not uploaded any files into it yet

drive.title: No files or directories uploaded yet
drive.info: Drag and drop files or directories here or press the button below

trash.title: Nothing in the trash yet
trash.info: Files and directories sent to the trash will appear here

recents.title: No files uploaded yet
recents.info: Recently uploaded files will appear here

links.title: No public links created yet
links.info: Public links of files and directories will appear here

favorites.title: Nothing favorited yet
favorites.info: Favorites files and directories will appear here

sharedIn.title: Nothing shared with you yet
sharedIn.info: Shared files and directories will appear here

sharedOut.title: Nothing shared with others yet
sharedOut.info: Shared files and directories will appear here

publicLink.invalidInfo: This public link either expired or does not exist

auth.title: This link is password protected
auth.subTitle: Please enter the password provided by the sender to gain access.

notes.maxSizeReached: Maximum note size is limited to {{chars}} characters

empty.title: No notes yet
empty.description: Notes that you have created or that you have been added to will appear here

removeParticipant.title: Remove participant
removeParticipant.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from this note?

deleteNote.title: Delete note
deleteNote.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone!

deleteTag.title: Delete tag
deleteTag.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone!

leaveNote.title: Leave note
leaveNote.description: Are you sure you want to leave {{name}}? You will no longer be able to access the note.

unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved changes
unsavedChanges.description: Are you sure you want to exit without saving? All changes will be lost.

remove.title: Remove
remove.description: Are you sure you want to remove {{item}} from your shares? You will no longer be able to access it!

close.title: Close
close.description: Are you sure you want to exit Filen?

empty.title: Empty trash
empty.description: Are you sure you want to empty your trash? This action cannot be undone!

notifications.contactRequestInfo: {{name}} has sent you a contact request

cookieConsent.description: This site uses cookies to measure and improve your experience.

networkDrive.missingDepsWindows: To use the network drive you need to have WinFSP installed on your system.
networkDrive.missingDepsLinux: To use the network drive you need to have FUSE3 installed on your system.
networkDrive.description: Mount your cloud drive as a network drive, making it easy to access and manage your files directly from your computer. Enjoy seamless integration, real-time synchronization, and secure access to your data, all within your familiar file explorer.
networkDrive.unixDescription: Mount your cloud drive inside a local directory, making it easy to access and manage your files directly from your computer. Enjoy seamless integration, real-time synchronization, and secure access to your data, all within your familiar file explorer.
networkDrive.sudo: To mount and unmount your cloud drive the client might need admin rights. Please allow access when you are prompted.
networkDrive.limitations: Installing, running or unpacking programs and archives on the network drive is not supported.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.info: Enable or disable the network drive. Refresh your explorer when toggling this option

mountPoint.name: Mount point
mountPoint.info: Set the mount point to a local directory. The local directory needs to be empty and readable and writable

driveLetter.name: Drive letter
driveLetter.info: Set the drive letter for the network drive. Only available drive letters will show up

browse.name: Browse
browse.info: Browse the network drive using your default explorer

cache.name: Cache
cache.info: Caching significantly speeds up browsing your network drive

cacheSize.name: Cache size
cacheSize.info: We recommend setting the cache size as high as possible. The client will use your local disk to significantly speed up the network drive

cachePath.name: Cache location
cachePath.info: Change the cache location of the network drive. Must be on an internal disk. Will use the app installation directory by default if unchanged

readOnly.name: Read only
readOnly.info: Mount the network drive as read only

cleanupCache.title: Clear cache
cleanupCache.description: Are you sure you want to clear the local cache? Clearing the cache can significantly slow down initial file loading times.

disable.title: Disable
disable.description: Are you sure you want to disable the network drive? Every active operation on it will be cancelled or will error. Please make sure you are not actively using it anymore.

errors.mountPointNotEmpty: Mount point needs to be an empty directory.
errors.pathNotInHomeDir: Mount point needs to be inside your home directory (/home/<yourUsername>).
errors.pathNotInUserDir: Mount point needs to be inside your user directory (/Users/<yourUsername>).
errors.invalidCachePath: Cache location must be on an internal disk with at least 10 GB of free space.
errors.cachePathNotReadableWritable: Cache location is not readable or writable.
errors.invalidCachePathLength: Cache location path is too long.

transfers.uploadingSpeed: Uploading {{total}} file in the background at {{speed}}
transfers.uploadingPluralSpeed: Uploading {{total}} files in the background at {{speed}}

webdav.description: Start a local WebDAV server, providing a standardized protocol to access and manage your cloud drive. This allows compatibility with a wide range of applications and devices that support WebDAV, enhancing your file accessibility and management capabilities.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.info: Enable or disable the WebDAV server

hostname.name: Hostname
hostname.info: Change the hostname the server should listen on

port.name: Port
port.info: Change the port the server should listen on

username.name: Username
username.info: Change the HTTP authentication username. This is should not be your Filen email or nickname

password.name: Password
password.info: Change the HTTP authentication password. This is should not be your Filen password

disable.title: Disable
disable.description: Are you sure you want to disable the WebDAV server? Every active operation on it will be cancelled or will error. Please make sure you are not actively using it anymore.

s3.description: Start a local S3 server, providing a standardized protocol to access and manage your cloud drive. This allows compatibility with a wide range of applications and devices that support S3, enhancing your file accessibility and management capabilities.
s3.info: When connecting to the S3 server you need to set the region to "filen" and enable "s3ForcePathStyle".

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.info: Enable or disable the S3 server

hostname.name: Hostname
hostname.info: Change the hostname the server should listen on

port.name: Port
port.info: Change the port the server should listen on

accessKeyId.name: AccessKeyId
accessKeyId.info: Change the AccessKeyId. This is should not be your Filen email or nickname

secretKeyId.name: SecretKeyId
secretKeyId.info: Change the SecretKeyId. This is should not be your Filen password

disable.title: Disable
disable.description: Are you sure you want to disable the S3 server? Every active operation on it will be cancelled or will error. Please make sure you are not actively using it anymore.

info.remoteSmokeTestFailed: Could not read cloud directory, either it does not exist or you are not connected to the internet
info.localSmokeTestFailed: Could not read local directory, either it does not exist or you do not have read or write access
info.confirmDeletionBoth: Confirm deletion of {{previous}} files and directories
info.confirmDeletionLocal: Confirm deletion of {{previous}} local files and directories
info.confirmDeletionRemote: Confirm deletion of {{previous}} remote files and directories

empty.title: No syncs set up yet
empty.description: You can sync your local directories with the cloud or cloud directories with your device

forceSync.name: Force sync
forceSync.info: Reset the internal cache and force re-scanning of the local and cloud directory

filenIgnore.name: .filenignore
filenIgnore.info: Edit an ignore file for local or cloud exclusions. Works just like a .gitignore file

disableLocalTrash.name: Disable local trash
disableLocalTrash.info: Enable or disable the local trash. When disabled, the client will permanently delete files or directories instead of moving them into the local trash directory inside the local sync path

requireConfirmationOnLargeDeletion.name: Deletion confirmation
requireConfirmationOnLargeDeletion.info: Manually confirm large deletions in the sync directory

delete.title: Delete sync
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this sync?

resetErrors.title: Resolve errors
resetErrors.description: Are you sure you want to mark all errors as resolved and continue syncing? Please make sure all errors are resolved.

deleteIssue.title: Delete issue
deleteIssue.description: Are you sure you want to delete this issue? Please make sure that you have resolved it or it was temporary, otherwise it will come back eventually.

clearTransferEvents.title: Clear events
clearTransferEvents.description: Are you sure you want to clear the locally saved events? This action cannot be undone.

confirmDeletionLocal.title: Confirm deletion
confirmDeletionLocal.description: Are you sure? This will move all {{count}} files and directories into the trash in the cloud. This action cannot be undone.

confirmDeletionRemote.title: Confirm deletion
confirmDeletionRemote.description: Are you sure? This will move all {{count}} files and directories into the local trash. This action cannot be undone.

confirmDeletionBoth.title: Confirm deletion
confirmDeletionBoth.description: Are you sure? This will move all {{count}} files and directories into the local and cloud trash. This action cannot be undone.

confirmDeletionRestart.title: Restart sync
confirmDeletionRestart.description: You can restart the sync if you have restored all files and folders manually.

reasons.dotFile: File or directory is inside a dot path
reasons.defaultIgnore: File or directory is inside a path that is ignored by default
reasons.invalidPath: File or directory is inside an invalid path
reasons.symlink: File or directory is a symlink. The client does not follow symlinks to prevent infinite sync loops.
reasons.duplicate: File or directory path exists twice
reasons.invalidType: Item is not a file or directory
reasons.nameLength: File or directory name too long
reasons.pathLength: File or directory path too long

title.noSpace: Not enough space or file watchers available
title.fileOrDirNameTooLong: File or directory name/path too long

info.permission: Please ensure the client has all needed permissions to access the local sync directory.
info.io: Please ensure your local sync directory and underlying storage media works. The client is not able to properly access it.
info.noSpace: You do not have enough local storage space left, or the system ran out of available file watchers.
info.openFiles: The client has hit the limit of open files. Please increase the limit.
info.fileOrDirExists: The file or directory already exists. This is most likely a temporary issue, try restarting the client.
info.fileOrDirNotFound: File or directory not found. This is most likely a temporary issue, try restarting the client.
info.isFile: This is most likely a temporary issue, try restarting the client.
info.isDir: This is most likely a temporary issue, try restarting the client.
info.notDir: This is most likely a temporary issue, try restarting the client.
info.badConnection: Please ensure you are connected to the internet and can access Filen without issues.
info.fileOrDirTemporarilyUnavailable: This is most likely a temporary issue, try restarting the client.
info.unknown: Unknown error, try restarting the client.
info.dirNotEmpty: The directory is not empty. This is most likely a temporary issue, try restarting the client.
info.fileOrDirNameTooLong: File or directory name/path too long for your local filesystem.

isOnline.title: Did someone unplug the cable?
isOnline.info: We're having trouble connecting you to our platform, please check your internet connection.
isOnline.infoSub: Please contact us if your internet works.

404.info: Oops, the page you are looking for does not exist.

maintenance.title: Filen is currently under maintenance
maintenance.info: We're currently performing some maintenance to make your experience even better. Our platform will be back shortly, fresh and improved.
maintenance.infoSub: Thank you for your patience! We're working hard behind the scenes to bring you new features. Stay tuned!
